title: Explained: Why it might be a good idea to keep AC temperature above 24 degrees this summer | Explained News,The Indian Express
content: In humid climates set temperature closer to 24 degrees Celsius for de humidification and in dry climates closer to or at 30 degrees Celsius and use fans to increase air movement) . ” It quotes a study that found the transmission of Covid-19 in 100 cities in China lower in high temperature and high humidity.
